title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 700.6 - State Administrative Procedure Act applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 700.6 - State Administrative Procedure Act applications

State Regulations

Any hearing under this Part shall be conducted in accordance
with the New York State Administrative Procedure Act (SAPA), as
amended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
700.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
